commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: This allows for spaces in the parameters to get parsed correctly.

commits.author: Paul Chaignon
commits.summary: Avoid using the ambiguous \h shorthand character
commits.body:
Depending on the regular expression engine used, \h does not always
mean the same. With a PCRE engine, it matches white spaces, whereas,
with a Oniguruma engine, it matches hexademical digit characters.
Atom uses an Oniguruma engine, but github.com relies on a PCRE
engine.

commits.author: Martin KÃ¼hl
commits.body:
In code like the following, the annotation on the top-level class
is not highlighted like an annotation:

```java
@Amazing class Thing {}
```

This change fixes that by including the `#annotation` rules
at the top level.
